title: Kirksey Architecture named Enterprise Champion for its innovation over the past 44 years
content:
Fast 100 Enterprise Champions were selected by an outside panel of judges for demonstrating outstanding innovation, corporate culture and community service, in addition to thriving in revenue growth.



Kirksey Architecture, one of Houston’s largest architecture firms, has had a big year.

In addition to growing its gross revenue to more than $49 million in 2014, the company added 40 employees in the past two years. And, in April, Kirksey transitioned from a firm owned solely by its founder and…
